titleStmt.title: The art of stenographie teaching by plaine and certaine rules, to the capacitie of the meanest, and for the vse of all professions, the way of compendious writing. Wherevnto is annexed a very easie direction for stegan'ographie, or, secret writing.
titleStmt.author: Willis, John, d. 1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. White] for Cuthbert Burbie,

notesStmt.note: Includes folded table, bound after G2, final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
